issue.title: [CF 951] UIDropDownMenu .lua error
issue.body:
Last night I did a racechange on a character and afterwards I have a small broken piece of a dropdown menu stuck on screen that appears on EVERY SINGLE TOON and it only happens with TellMeWhen enabled <which I use on every single toon>

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
X-Curse-Packaged-Version: 6.2.6-415-gd2b4e42

Do you have an error log of what happened?

1x FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:809: attempt to concatenate a nil value
FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:809: in function <FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:745>
<in C code>
<string>:"*:OnClick":1: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = <unnamed> {
0 = <userdata>
Right = UIParentRight {
}
Left = UIParentLeft {
}
wrapTooltips = true
__ttshowchecker = "IsEnabled"
__ttHooked = 1
initialize = <function> defined @Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Components\IconModules\IconModule_IconDragger\module.lua:56
Button = UIParentButton {
}
data = <table> {
}
Middle = UIParentMiddle {
}
Text = UIParentText {
}
}
= <function> defined @Interface\FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:745
= <function> defined @Interface\AddOns\MogIt\Libs\Libra\Dropdown.lua:354

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

It continues to send this .lua error even with all other addons disabled <including mogit which for some reason is in the error even tho it's disabled on every toon>

I racechanged/namechanged and immediately upon login this error is on every toon, I changed name to a name that I have previously used on another toon. Not sure how exactly this happened or why I have a small section of a dropdownmenu stuck on my screen now, but that error happens every time I try to click on the broken piece of the menu stuck roughly midscreen.


> Posted by CurseForge user cleric670 | Imported from CurseForge issue #951 | Raw
